info.title: EXPERIMENTAL module - Spanish for English Speakers

lcnx.title: Newbie Introductions
lcnx.dscrip:
This lesson focuses on sentences that you will need
early in your immersion process to explain that you
are new to the Spanish language - as well as to
request various acts of patience from the more
seasoned speakers you interact with. This section
is first because the LanguaMunity philosophy values
immersion so much as to encourage you to begin the
immersion part of your language learning as quickly
as possible.

While there is no guarantee of people extending to
you the acts of patience that you request, your
chances of receiving such acts of patience are
greater if you know how to request them and to
explain why you need them than if you don't know
how to do so.

lcnx.title: A Bit More Conversation
lcnx.dscrip:
Now that you know the how to explain your situation and ask for
people's patience, it is time to learn a little bit of conversation
beyond that.

lcnx.title: Still More Conversation
lcnx.dscrip:
Your journey of learning more conversational language-samples
continues.

lcnx.title: Numbers (part one)
lcnx.dscrip: Let's start learning to count in Spanish.

lcnx.title: Still More Conversation (again)
lcnx.dscrip:
Your journey of learning more conversational language-samples
continues.

lcnx.title: At the Market
lcnx.dscrip:
Let's prepare to do some grocery shopping - at Philadelphia's historic
Italian Market
